name: Red Light (Maow)
description:
An abandoned, endless building. Flickering lights. A classic playground game turned into your worst nightmare...

--------------------------

Red Light is a 2D horror puzzle game developed by Maow in the RPG Maker MV engine, inspired by Red Light Green Light from Found Horror Game 11.exe by AestheticGamer.

--------------------------

Video Guidelines

You're allowed to make playthroughs of this game if you want, but I would like to request that you at least link this page in your video's description, as well as send a link to your video in the comments of this page.

--------------------------

Credits

You can view the credits.txt file in the game files. (This will be filled out in a Google doc when the game is fully released)
